original: 渤海太守袁紹為首，加上長沙太守孫堅、曹操率領之私軍，是為關東聯軍。孫堅任先鋒，氣燄強大，董卓問李儒有無應對計策。
text: Headed by Bohai Prefect Yuan Shao, together with the private army led by Changsha Prefect Sun Jian and Cao Cao, it is the Kwantung Allied Forces. Sun Jian is the vanguard, with a strong arrogance, Dong Zhuo asked Li Ru if he had any countermeasures.
